resources.string: You can contact a helpful information assistant at RU-info with your Rutgers questions by phone, text, or email.
You can also call RU-info from any phone to speak to an Information Assistant at 732–445–INFO (4636), or text your question via RU-info TEXT. Text \'Rutgers\' to 66746 on your mobile phone.
To sign up for RU-info TEXT:
Or, if you have already signed up:
For hours and additional info, visit us online:
